name: Medic Mech
description:
Medic Mech was a 48 hour project created for Global Game Jam 2020 by 4 strangers. The theme for the 2020 jam was repair. After tossing a few ideas around our team set out to make the most of the time we had. It was great getting to know these talented people and hope to do it again next year! Now go download it and play it!

Skylar Whitehurst: Studio Whisker

(Programing / Game Design)

Alex Barton: newyear Studios

(2d/3d Artist / Animation / Game Design)

Jay Zak

(UI Artist / Audio) 

Venus Mitteer

(2D Artist / Writer/Audio)

Matrix 8967

(Theme Song)
